body_html:
The strange error messge was also mentioned a few times in the forum.
Here is a code snippet for PyTorch 0.4.0:

model = nn.Conv2d(3, 6, 3)
x = torch.randn(3, 24, 24) # batch_dim is missing
output = model(x) # RuntimeError regarding the stride

body:
The strange error messge was also mentioned a few times in the forum.
Here is a code snippet for PyTorch ``0.4.0``:

```
model = nn.Conv2d(3, 6, 3)
x = torch.randn(3, 24, 24) # batch_dim is missing
output = model(x) # RuntimeError regarding the stride
```
